name: Yuxiao Sun
tagline: I am a graduate student at the University of Chicago reading M.A. in social science. My concentrations are computational linguistics and machine learning.
body:
**PASSION:** pattern recognition & causal inference

**EXPERIENCE:** data analyst, market researcher, database manager and financial analyst.

**SKILL:** Python/R for programming and natural language processing; STATA/SPSS for statistical analysis; Matlab/MAPLE for mathematical modelling; SQL/Hadoop for database; Tableau/GIS for visualization; JavaScript for web development.

**LANGUAGE:** English/Fluent; Mandarin Chinese/Fluent; French/Beginner
 

**Working Projects:**

1. [Study on Media Bias](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/hwcfpp/tree/master/project)

2. [Machine Learning Pipeline/Toolkit](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/capp-455136/tree/master/mlpipe)

3. [US Nonprofits Database](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngo)

4. [Study on NGO's Mission Statements and Fund Raising Capacity](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngomission)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
